UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design, Characterization and Antimicrobial activity of Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from Bovine Lactophoricin.
Literature.Author: Kim JS, Joeng JH, Kim Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria innocua MC2 KCTC 3658(IC50=>18µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(IC50=>23µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(IC50=>5µM),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 19430(IC50=>22µM),Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(IC50=>7.5µM)
